"A.D.2028/4/17/15:40": "Earth Guide can't contact ARKS either..."
"We don't even know where the ARKS ship went. How are we supposed to get back there? Damn it!"
"W-What's happening? Hitsugi? What's wrong?!"
"Is the Ether cascading out of control?! What the hell is this?"

"What?!
<%me>! Hitsugi!"
"I'm sick of all this... I'm sick of being alone... I don't want to lose anything...'"
"Don't cry, big sis. I'm here... with you."
"Aru?"
"And not just me... Big brother Enga... And <%me> are by your side too."
"Hey, big sis... Can you feel our presence?"
"It's... warm. This is Aru, and big bro, and... <%me>?"
"You're not alone, big sis. Big sis isn't wrong about anything."
"But I don't have any motives! Nothing I want to do... I even lost to Kohri..."
"I'm... I'm already sick of being afraid! I'm sick of all the pain! The suffering, the struggles, all of it!"
"Then, I will take all of your burdens."
"...What?"
" The fear, the pain, the suffering, the struggles... and even being alone, I'll take all of it."
"So don't cry, big sis. I don't want to see you cry."
"Like that time you rescused me... Like that time you saved me... Open your eyes, face forward... and smile."
"Aru? Hey, Aru... where are you going?"
"Big sis... I'll always be by your side."
"Aru!"
